title: Task Phase Skip Request
description: Ask for a phase to be skipped.

type.description: Indicate that this is a phase skip request

task_id.description: Specify the task ID whose phase should be skipped

phase_id.description: Specify the phase that should be skipped

labels.description: Labels to describe the purpose of the skip, items can be a single value like `dashboard` or a key-value pair like `app=dashboard`, in the case of a single value, it will be interpreted as a key-value pair with an empty string value.
